articles.author: Aaron Couch
articles.title: Lucasfilm Boss Kathleen Kennedy Expected to Retire This Year - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The prolific producer has presided over the 'Star Wars' and 'Indiana Jones' franchises through ups and downs since 2012.
articles.content: After more than a decade in a galaxy far, far away, Kathleen Kennedy is charting a course toward retirement. The Lucasfilm boss has told associates she plans to retire by the end of 2025, Puck report… [+2804 chars]
